/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a pedestrian's perspective on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a verdant canopy overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
